faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about diBoaS.

safety.question: Is my money safe?
safety.answer: Your funds are held in your own non-custodial wallet. We never touch your money - we just show you where to put it. The protocols we use (Aave, Compound) have secured billions of dollars.

risks.question: What are the risks?
risks.answer: DeFi yields are not bank deposits. Smart contract risk exists. We only use battle-tested protocols, but no investment is risk-free. Never invest more than you can afford to lose.

withdraw.question: Can I withdraw anytime?
withdraw.answer: Yes. No lock-ups. Your money is always accessible. Withdrawals typically complete same day.

revenue.question: How do you make money?
revenue.answer: We take a small fee (0.12%) when you earn. If you don't earn, we don't earn. We're aligned.

crypto.question: Do I need to understand crypto?
crypto.answer: No. We handle all the complexity. You just see your money growing. No wallets, no seed phrases, no confusing charts.
